dialogue.speaker: Pointy-Haired Boss
dialogue.text: YOU KNOW WHAT I JUST REALIZED, DOGBERT?

dialogue.speaker: Dogbert
dialogue.text: THE LITTLE HAIRS ON THE BACK OF MY HAND - THEY NEVER GET ANY LONGER.

dialogue.speaker: Pointy-Haired Boss
dialogue.text: BEFORE I RESPOND, JUST GIVE ME A MOMENT TO BASK IN THE RADIANCE OF YOUR WISDOM.

dialogue.speaker: Dogbert
dialogue.text: THE LITTLE HAIRS ON THE BACK OF MY HAND - THEY NEVER GET ANY LONGER.
